description: This file defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot application, providing centralized handling of exceptions and standardized API error responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring ControllerAdvice that handles exceptions globally for the application.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles NotFoundException and returns a 404 response.

methods.name: handleMethodArgumentNotValid
methods.description: Overrides default validation error handling to include detailed field errors.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions, returning a 500 Internal Server Error.

methods.name: baseBody
methods.description: Constructs the standard error response body with timestamp, status, error, and message.
